How do we allow people to be assured that nobody who is unstable gets a hold of ammunition and guns? Grace Napolitano said in a phone interview. "I'm sure we'll touch upon it." But even Capitol Hill's staunchest gun-control advocates aren't holding their breath for reforms in the 112th Congress.

Mike Pence may have even forced the NRA's hand on whether or not to score the Senate vote on Elena Kagan . The NRA scored the vote on Sonia Sotomayor , the first time they have scored a vote on a Supreme Court justice, a score that will knock down the grades of usually-reliable Democrats like Harry Reid of Nevada. by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home," Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for Barack Obama in 2012. Mike Pence said he would make a decision about his future later and would be traveling across the state in the months ahead to "learn about how Hoosiers think we might best contribute in the years ahead.

Mike Pence said he embraced the Republican Party while attending law school in Indianapolis, largely because he heard in Ronald Reagan the manifestation of the kind of traditional American ideals that I was raised to believe in. ( Besides Reagan, Mike Pence 's other top political heroes include Republicans Jack Kemp and Dan Quayle .) But his first attempts at elected office didn't go smoothly.
